page.title: 11INDUSTRY IN WALKDEN contd
page.content: INDUSTRY IN WALKDEN CONTINUED Industry in Walkden has never been successful.The old factory relics can still be found around the area.Many abandoned warehouses are now being pulled down to make room for new factory units.The little industry that there is lies on the outskirts of the town on industrial estates near the main roads.Here,medical aids,recycled metals and do_it_yourself are the main industries.Many of the old factory buildings have been converted into smaller separate work units producing a variety of goods.Some of these units could hardly be classed as industry due to their low output. The majority of Walkden's population work outside the town in places like Manchester and Bolton. BY LISA MOORE and BOHLUM NG
